titleStmt.title: Ānandatīrtha's Nyāyavivaraṇa ad Bādarayaṇa's Brahmasūtra; Ānandatīrtha's Anuvyākhyāna ad Bādarayaṇa's Brahmasūtra; Ānandatīrtha's Nakhastotra

repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary:
A multitext manuscript containing:
Ānandatīrtha's Nyāyavivaraṇa (adhyāya 1-4) ad Bādarayaṇa's Brahmasūtra,
Anuvyākhyāna of Ānandatīrtha (1.4.113-) ad Bādarayaṇa's Brahmasūtra, &
Nakhastotra of Ānandatīrtha

msItem.title: Nyāyavivaraṇa
msItem.author: Ānandatīrtha
msItem.rubric:
śrīvedavyāsāya namaḥ | śrīmadānaṃdatīrthāsarvaśācāryāya namaḥ | śrībhāratyai namaḥ | śrī
namaḥ | śrīlakṣmīnṛsiṃhāya namaḥ | śubham astu || oṃ
msItem.incipit:
cetanācetanajaganniyaṃtre śeṣasaṃvide | namonā
rāyaṇayājaśarvaśakrādivaṃditaḥ || 1 || kṛtvā bhāṣyānubhāṣye ham api vedārthasatpateḥ | kṛṣṇasya sūtra
nuvyākhyāsanyāyavivṛtiṃ sphuṭam || 2 || karomi maṃdabuddhīnāṃ budhānāṃ copakārikāṃ prītyai ta
syaiva devasya tatprasādapuraḥsaraḥ || 3 || jīvavyatirikteśvarābhāvāt tasya ca svaprakāśatvān na jijñā
syateti
msItem.explicit: ṭākṣedhitasya tu | kā nu śaktir bhaven naiva tataḥ ko trātivismayaḥ | vidyāvidye sukhaṃ

msItem.title: Anuvyākhyāna
msItem.author: Ānandatīrtha
msItem.incipit:
dhyamādhyamaṃ | vācārabdhaṃ tu sāṃketyaṃ nāma syād vikṛtaṃ bahu | nityaṃ tu nāmadheyaṃ yaṃmṛttiketyādi vai
dikam | prādhānyāt tatparijñānāt prākṛtājño pi pūruṣaḥ | vidvān ity ucyate sadbhir evaṃ nityaparātmavit |
sadātanaṃ satyam iti nityam evocyate budhaiḥ |
msItem.explicit:
niḥśeṣadoṣarahitaḥ kalyāṇākhilasadguṇa | bhūtisvayaṃbhuśarvādivaṃdyaṃ tvāṃ naumi me priyam ||
|| || 60 || || om iti śrīmadānaṃdatīrthabhagavatpādaviracite śrīmadbrahmasūtrānuvyākhyāne caturtho dhyāyasya caturthapādaḥ | || iti caturthādhyāyaḥ | ||
msItem.finalRubric:
śrīkṛṣṇārpaṇam astu || śubham astu || ||
ity anuvyākhyānaṃ samāptaṃ || || vibhodhisaṃvatsarasya caitrabahūlapaṃchamī bhṛguvārena rahaṇālikhitam idaṃ pustakaṃ || || ||
msItem.colophon:
virodhisaṃvatsarasya caitrabahūlapaṃchamī bhṛguvārena rahaṇālikhitam idaṃ pustakaṃ || || ||
narahariṇā likhitam idam anuvyākhyānasya pustakaṃ

msItem.title: Nakhastuti
msItem.author: Ānandatīrtha
msItem.incipit:
pāntvasmān puruhūtavairibalavanmātaṅgamādyadghaṭā
kuṃbhoccādrivipāṭanādhikapaṭupratyekava
jrāyitāḥ | śrīmatkaṃṭhīravāsyapratata
sunakharā dāritārātidūrapradhvastadhvātaśāṃtapravitatamanasā bhāvitā nākivṛ
daiḥ || 1 || lakṣmīkāṃta samaṃtato vi kalayan naiveśatus te samaṃ paśyāmy uttamavastu dūratarato
pāstaṃ raso yo ṣṭamaḥ | yadroṣotkaradakṣanetrakuṭilaprāṃtotthitāgniḥ sphuratkhadyetopa
mavisphuliṃgabhasitā brahmeśaśakrotkarāḥ || 2 || || oṃ ||—

extent.measure: 2 guard folios at the beginning of the bundle, ff. 1-36, ff. 24-114, f. 115r, 2 guard folios at the end of the bundle

supportDesc.foliation: Nandināgarī numerals, left margin ff. 1-36; ff. 24-114r; f. 115r (unnumbered)
supportDesc.condition: Some folios are damaged at the borders

handNote.desc: Clear hand-writing although the ink fades away towards the right margin
Clear hand-writing but although ink fades away towards the right margin
Clear hand-writing but although ink fades away towards the right margin

additions.desc: On the verso of the first guard folio at the end of the bundle: narahariyapustakaṃ anuvyākhyānanyāyavivarṇavāyustupāṃtvasmāniśloka
On the recto of the second guard folio at the end of the bundle: śrīvedavyāsāya namaḥ

listBibl.bibl: Janert, Klaus Ludwig, Poti, N. Narasimhan. 1985. Verzeichnis der orientalischen Handschriften in Deutschland. Band II, 7. Stuttgart: F. Steiner. MS 2861; MS 2862. p. 947.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces between words added where possible.
